SELECT O.REQUEST_NUM ,ORDER_DATE ,ORDER_STATUS ,C.CUSTOMER_NUM ,C.CUSTOMER_NAME ,(R.QUANTITY * P.PRODUCT_PRICE) as TOTALPRICE FROM order_requests R, orders O , customers C, products P WHERE O.REQUEST_NUM = R.REQUEST_NUM AND R.CUSTOMER_NUM = C.CUSTOMER_NUM AND R.PRODUCT_NUM = P.PRODUCT_NUM
AND ( REQUEST_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR REQUEST_STATUS LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchValue}, '%') )
ORDER BY R.REQUEST_NUM DESC
